name: LuckyDiamond
description: The only online casino on the SPm server, presents 5 game modes on its website, works honestly.

24.03.2024.title: LuckyDiamond Casino wins court case
24.03.2024.description: The judge of the special court considered the appeal of case 3552, but it never opened. Conditions were put forward for the casino to fully open.

21.03.2024.title: LuckyDiamond Casino lost the court case.
21.03.2024.description: The SPm court ordered the heads of the LuckyDiamond casino to freeze their casino due to dishonesty of work and because of the crooked document "User Agreement" and pay a fine of 1,728 AR.

name: FreshMarket
description: The only market place on the SPm server that uses a website, not a discord of bots.

18.03.2024.title: The creator of the Freshmarket, zarlax, was blocked on the SPm server.
18.03.2024.description: The creator was blocked without trial, but with the help of the administration for distributing third-party resources. The fate of the marketplace is unknown.

31.08.2023.title: Opening of the first online marketplace on SPm.
31.08.2023.description: The announcement of the only marketplace was presented.

name: SPm - gobnik
description: Organization for the creation of various services
